query: SELECT r.recipeId, r.menuItemId, r.ingredientId, r.quantity, i.name as ingredient_name, i.costPerUnit FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN ingredients i ON r.ingredientId = i.ingredientId LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cZxp9onhTXAgp9c.root --database b88poXb5RJ3R7HPWuRcyYW --execute SELECT r.recipeId, r.menuItemId, r.ingredientId, r.quantity, i.name as ingredient_name, i.costPerUnit FROM recipes r LEFT JOIN ingredients i ON r.ingredientId = i.ingredientId LIMIT 20;
